module.name: construction_geometry
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies the definitions of geometric items needed for constructing geometry or defining requirements for geometric dimensional tolerance.

inscope.li: Geometry used in the construction of shape representations;
Geometry used in the definitions of tolerance zones or datums.

uof.name: Construction_Geometry
uof.description: The Construction_Geometry UoF provides for construction geometry that is not necessarily part of the shape definition. Construction geometry is theoretically exact. A perfect axis may be derived from an imperfect hole in order to specify the location of the hole.
